doc.title: Flying Into Love
doc.plot: A provocative re-imagining of the JFK assassination as seen through the eyes of Jackie Kennedy and four individuals whose lives are forever altered by this event and its haunting legacy on the American psyche. Tragic public events unite us all as a nation, but the private pain of those directly affected is rarely seen. The narrative floats between a dream and a nightmare, between myth and reality to reveal the Kennedy's intimate love story and a nation's innocence in its final hours.
